Tech.name: Waves Rush to Shore
Tech.Description: Whirlwind Fighters are a constant blur of motion, using their swift and relentless strikes both to deflect their opponents' attack and to break through their defenses. When fighting with a kama in each hand, you may add your Knives Skill Rank to your Armor TN, and gain a bonus of 3k0 to your damage rolls with kama.
